sources.name: Facts
sources.script:
source(output(
		employeeID as string,
		Hours as string,
		Amount as string,
		ProjDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Facts/today/*.csv']) ~> Facts

sources.name: DimEmployee
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployee

sinks.name: writeFactTable
sinks.script:
JoinAllColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	mapColumn(
		ProjDate = OrigData@ProjDate,
		TotalHours,
		Hours,
		Amount,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		EmpID,
		facttimestamp
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> writeFactTable

transformations.name: SetAttributes
transformations.script:
Facts derive(employeeID = toInteger(employeeID),
		iscurrent = 1,
		facttimestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttributes

transformations.name: LookupDimEmployee
transformations.script:
SetAttributes, DimEmployee lookup(employeeID == EmpID
	&& SetAttributes@iscurrent == DimEmployee@iscurrent,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDimEmployee

transformations.name: OrigData
transformations.script:
LookupDimEmployee select(mapColumn(
		employeeID,
		Hours,
		Amount,
		ProjDate,
		facttimestamp,
		EmpID,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent = DimEmployee@iscurrent,
		processtime
	))~> OrigData

transformations.name: JoinAllColumns
transformations.script:
DailyHourTotal, OrigData join(DailyHourTotal@ProjDate == OrigData@ProjDate,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinAllColumns
